tool_description: API returns over 50,000+ famous quotes from over 10,000+ great authors and over 350+ different categories.
name: World of Quotes
title: World of Quotes

api_list.name: Get Quotes By Specific Category
api_list.description: This API returns the collection of quotes by category you pass in the query params. Maximum you can get 20 quotes at a time and can be customized by *limit*. Our API support pagination and records can be paginated by *page* query param.

api_list.name: Get Quote of the Day
api_list.description:
This API returns the handpicked quote of the day among 45,000+ quotes based on the highest ratings.
You may also get quote of the day of specific *author* or *category*.

api_list.name: Get Quotes By Specific Author
api_list.description: This API returns the collection of quotes by author you pass in the query params. Maximum you can get 20 quotes at a time and can be customized by *limit*. Our API support pagination and records can be paginated by *page* query param.

api_list.name: Get Authors
api_list.description:
This API returns array of over 10,000 authors we have in our library.
This returns an array of strings.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://world-of-quotes.p.rapidapi.com/v1/quotes/author"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "world-of-quotes.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Quotes Category
api_list.description:
This API returns array of over 350 types of categories we have in our library.
This returns an array of strings. Real response will have more categories but in mock response we displayed a few.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://world-of-quotes.p.rapidapi.com/v1/quotes/category"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "world-of-quotes.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
